𓅨𓂋𓂋𓇋𓇋𓏏𓌝 gwarriet ≈ 𓎡𓄿𓃀𓏲𓍘𓇋𓆱 cavalryti ≈ ϭⲱⲟⲩⲧⲥ radical reading

chariot

A true wanderword, unsurprising since the spoked chariot was invented only once. It quickly conquered every nation, in a very rapid fashion called the seima-turbino phenomenon, bringing metallurgy to china and the Hyksos to Egypt.

𒂊𒋆𒄣 ᵏe-req-qu •cart / •Gerecke 𓌝 𐎗𐎋 rig ≈ √ride 𒂊𒋆𒄣 cart, wagon

𓂋 𓃗 -c-b equipe, cheval
